titleStmt.title: A proclamation for a solemn national thanksgiving.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the twenty day of November, and of Our Reign the nynth year 1697.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
